1.0.0.name: wordpress/simple-events-shortcode
1.0.0.description: This plugin adds an 'Events' link to your admin menu. Add a new event. Then, add a new page called 'Events' or whatever you want to call it. Then, put the shortcode [simple_events_shortcode] on that page, and your events will be displayed.
